DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether BMS-986036 effective treatment subject Non-alcoholic Steatohepatitis ( NASH ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study BMS-986036 Subjects With Non-Alcoholic Steatohepatitis ( NASH )
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Male female 21 75 year old Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25 Chronic Liver disease NASH Uncontrolled diabetes Any major surgery within 6 week screen Unable selfadminister skin injection Any bone trauma , fracture bone surgery within 8 week screen
